block.p: Opera is a traditional performing 1 art in China. Chinese operas include singing, acting, dancing, and story-telling in one amazing 2 performance on the stage. Traditional musical instruments are used and the songs tell 3 folktales from long ago. The 4 sets are very simple but the actors wear fantastic costumes and colorful masks or 5 make-up. The color of their make-up tells the audience about the character of the actors. Red means the character is brave, and white means 6 evil. The Chinese have been performing these operas for over a thousand years.
